prompt.promptText: At the MOST RECENT signal, how much were you worrying?
At the MOST RECENT signal, how hard was it to control your worry?
How many minutes ago did this worry episode begin?
What is the worry about? Check all that apply.
In one sentence, please write out your worried thought WHEN YOU WERE SIGNALED.
If the outcome you are worried about were to happen, how negative would it be for you?
At the MOST RECENT signal, how hard was it to control your worry?
Are you thinking about the same topic as when you were last signaled?
What is the worry about? Check all that apply.
In one sentence, please write out your worried thought WHEN YOU WERE SIGNALED.
At the MOST RECENT signal, how hard was it to control your worry?
Are you thinking about the same topic as when you were last signaled?
What is the worry about? Check all that apply.
In one sentence, please write out your worried thought WHEN YOU WERE SIGNALED.
How would you rate the intensity of this worry episode?
To what extent has the worry interfered with other things you’d rather focus on?
At the MOST RECENT signal, how hard was it to control your worry?
Are you thinking about the same topic as when you were last signaled?
What is the worry about? Check all that apply.
In one sentence, please write out your worried thought WHEN YOU WERE SIGNALED.
How would you rate the intensity of this worry episode?
To what extent has the worry interfered with other things you’d rather focus on?
When did you worried thoughts end?
After you stopped worrying, to what extent did additional worried thoughts intrude into your mind?
Thinking back, how would you rate the intensity of this worry episode?
To what extent did the worry interfere with other things you’d rather focus on?
At the MOST RECENT signal, how hard was it to control your thoughts?
When did thoughts about the current topic begin?
What is the thought about? Check all that apply.
In one sentence, please write out your thought WHEN YOU WERE SIGNALED.
How positive or negative is this thought?
At the MOST RECENT signal, how hard was it to control your thoughts?
Are you thinking about the same topic as when you were last signaled?
In one sentence, please write out your thought WHEN YOU WERE SIGNALED.
How negative or positive is this thought?
In one sentence, please write out your thought WHEN YOU WERE SIGNALED.
How negative or positive is this thought?
How would you rate the intensity of this thought episode?
To what extent have these thoughts interfered with other things you’d rather focus on?
When did your thoughts about that topic end?
After you stopped thinking about this topic, to what extent did additional thoughts about this topic intrude into your mind?
Thinking back, how would you rate the intensity of this thought episode?
To what extent did these thoughts interfere with other things you’d rather focus on?
